original_text: Simon Peter had run behind the other disciple. When he arrived, he went into the hole. He saw the pieces of cloth that were lying there.
korean_text: 시몬 베드로는 따라와서 무덤에 들어가 보니 세마포가 놓였고

sentences.original_text: Simon Peter had run behind the other disciple
sentences.korean_translation: 시몬 베드로는 다른 제자 뒤에서 달려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He saw the pieces of cloth
